title: Investors Who Put $2 Billion Into FTX Face Scrutiny, Too
description: Venture capital firms and investment funds showered the failed crypto exchange and its founder with money. There were few strings attached.
dc:creator: Erin Griffith and David Yaffe-Bellany

media:content.media:credit: Erika P. Rodriguez for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Sam Bankman-Fried, FTX’s founder, once told interested investors to “support him and observe.”
